documentation.text:
@dev Deposit `_amount` tokens in the pool `_poolIndex` for harvesting.
 Calls transferRewardsToDebt to store the current rewards.
 Calls transferFrom in the desired token.
 Increases taxed(`_amount`) from poolSize
 Charge 0.9% tax on it (if not tax-free pool)

@dev Withdraw `_amount` tokens from the harvesting pool `_poolIndex`.
 Calls transferRewardsToDebt to store the current rewards
 Reduces `_amount` from poolSize
 Charge 3.5% tax on it (if not tax-free pool)

@dev Create a pool with the token `_token`
 Determine if the pool charges taxes with `_taxFree`
 Determine how much LIME it's multiplied with the block delta with `_limePerBlock`
 Can only be called by the owner

@dev View function to check if harvesting is enabled
 Will check if the timestamp is divisible by 7 days
@dev View function to check how many pools there are

@dev View function to check how much stake a user has in
 the pool `_poolIndex`
@dev View function to check the pool size of `_poolIndex`
@dev View function to get the pools

documentation.text:
@dev Pure function that calculates how much LIME the user needs to get.
 Amount = blocks holded * LIME per block * (stake / poolSize)

@dev Deposit `_amount` tokens in the pool `_poolIndex` for harvesting.
 Calls transferRewardsToDebt to store the current rewards.
 Calls transferFrom in the desired token.
 Increases taxed(`_amount`) from poolSize
 Charge 0.9% tax on it (if not tax-free pool)

 Calls transferRewardsToDebt to store the current rewards
 Reduces `_amount` from poolSize
 Charge 3.5% tax on it (if not tax-free pool)

checkpoint(uint128).details: Function that transfers rewards to debt in the pool `poolIndex` creating a "Checkpoint", meaning that the earned tokens are now fixed.

createPool(address,uint256,bool).details: Create a pool with the token `_token` Determine if the pool charges taxes with `_taxFree` Determine how much LIME it's multiplied with the block delta with `_limePerBlock` Can only be called by the owner

depositTokens(uint256,uint128).details: Deposit `_amount` tokens in the pool `_poolIndex` for harvesting. Calls transferRewardsToDebt to store the current rewards. Calls transferFrom in the desired token. Increases taxed(`_amount`) from poolSize Charge 0.9% tax on it (if not tax-free pool)

getPoolSize(uint128).details: View function to check the pool size of `_poolIndex`

getPools().details: View function to get the pools

harvestLimes(uint128).details: Harvest the earned tokens in the pool `_poolIndex`, which are: UserInfo.debt + calculateAmount(pool, holdings) Can only be called on harvesting periods

isHarvestingPeriod().details: View function to check if harvesting is enabled Will check if the timestamp is divisible by 7 days

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

totalPools().details: View function to check how many pools there are

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userAvailableHarvest(uint128).details: View function to check how much LIME the user would receive if they harvested in the moment in the pool `_poolIndex`

userStakeInPool(uint128).details: View function to check how much stake a user has in the pool `_poolIndex`

withdrawTokens(uint256,uint128).details: Withdraw `_amount` tokens from the harvesting pool `_poolIndex`. Calls transferRewardsToDebt to store the current rewards Reduces `_amount` from poolSize Charge 3.5% tax on it (if not tax-free pool)
